name: personal-claude
description: Personal Claude Code plugins for software engineering workflows including development tooling, specification-driven development, git automation, and academic writing

plugins.name: dev-kit
plugins.description: Development toolkit with coding standards, specialized agents for code exploration/architecture/review, and mode-based commands for code, debug, docs, test, ask, and architect workflows

plugins.name: spec-dev
plugins.description: Specification-driven development workflow with commands for product planning, requirements gathering, spec writing, task breakdown, and implementation

plugins.name: git
plugins.description: Git workflow automation for staging, committing, branch cleanup, and pull request creation with conventional commit support

plugins.name: academic
plugins.description: Academic writing support for research papers with IEEE and ACM formatting standards, paper structure guidance, and citation patterns
